3.25.22  6:25 am   what is the key signature for here comes the sun

      1 sharp. except the bridge which would be 2 flats

3.25.22  2:31 am   what's the difference between attack, cutoff, decay, release, and any of those other words that i haven't said? what do they all do? why are their names so similar in meaning?

     the 'attack' knob controls how quick the note starts. Quick attack means the note plays immediately when you press the key. Slow attack means the note takes a long time to fade in.
     the 'decay' knob controls how quick the note fades away while you're holding the note. Quick decay means the note will disappear almost immediately after you press it, even if you hold the note down. only short notes allowed. dinks and donks. Long decay (or infinite) means the note will stay on as long as you hold the note.
     'release' is what happens when you let go of the note. Quick release means the note will stop as soon as you let go of the note. Slow release means the note will ring out for a long time after you let go (like a ringing bell).
     'cutoff', also called 'filter cutoff' is like a wawa pedal, if you've ever heard one of those. try saying "wawawawa"... this is probably what it would sound like if you hold a note and move the cutoff knob up and down. Turn the knob up and the sound gets more 'aaaa'. turn the knob down and the sound goes more 'ooo'

3.24.22  3:35 am   do you know the feeling of constantly pattern-matching your decisions against what a hypothetical "rational" person in a similar situation would do?

     in those situations, i prefer to consider myself the rational person. that way it feels more like first-hand thinking

     how do you escape the meta-thought-loop and just do stuff? 

     i've never tried this, but some people suggest holding out your hand, with nothing touching your hand, and feel the feeling you feel on your hand, with nothing touching it

3.24.22  12:52 am   I hate being a mediocre person surrounded by above-mediocre persons. I fucking hate it, I'm so sick of it. I can barely enjoy listening to music because I know the artist is worlds more musically talented than me. I wish to have a wish so that I could wish for the drive to become exceptional. Do you think if you have enough drive, anyone can become exceptional?

      first you should understand that your mind is playing tricks on you sometimes. you think everyone is better than you. that's just not true. many people whom you think are better than you, actually think everyone including you is better than them
